attributes.title: Stranger Than Stranger Things - Paradise Path RPG Ep 1
attributes.caption: "I work part time at the wiener factory..."
attributes.description:
Welcome to Monster of the Week on Must Be Dice! Watch and listen as a nerd, a tough, a hacker, and a dimwitted bro all join forces to keep from getting sued by the creators of The Monster Squad and Scooby Doo!



Follow us on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/ElyseWillems

https://twitter.com/jameswillems

https://twitter.com/_JacobFullerton

https://twitter.com/handsomemaster2

https://twitter.com/MandoDoesStuff



Tshirts n stuff: https://store.roosterteeth.com/collections/funhaus



Welcome to Funhaus, the internet's ONLY comedy, gaming, and variety channel since 2015!

About Must Be Dice: Paradise Path - An all RPG adventure from Funhaus! Can the kids of the Medford Bend Mystery Club save the day? Or will the roving gangs and vicious monsters of the forest pick them off one by one? Stranger things have happened.

Join FIRST to watch episodes early: http://bit.ly/2uNNz0O
attributes.display_title: WtPP:E1 - Stranger Than Stranger Things - Paradise Path RPG Ep 1

attributes.title: Trouble in Paradise - Paradise Path RPG Ep 2
attributes.caption: "I wanna talk about cool things like hats."
attributes.description:
Last time on Must Be Dice, the Paradise Path Mystery Solvers Club took on a strange new case: finding out what happened to a blue bicycle. However it feels like there's more going on than the client led them to believe. After making a sketchy deal with the Hell's Pass Gang, the group got their first clue, leading them to secret smoke spot full of vicious, fungus-encrusted coyotes!

 

Follow us on Twitter!

attributes.title: Mystery of the Humongous Fungus - Paradise Path RPG Ep 3
attributes.caption: "I'm not a wiener believer anymore!"
attributes.description:
Last time on Must Be Dice, the gang continued their search for Mike Seeker, a kid no one seems to remember, except for those who ingested some strange spores out in the woods. The Seeker Estate only revealed a giant black bear covered in the same spooky shrooms that plagued the forest and its inhabitants. Will they be able to defeat this monstrosity? And will Sloan EVER show up for her shift at The Wiener Factory?

 

Follow us on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/ElyseWillems

https://twitter.com/jameswillems

attributes.title: Watch the World Burn - Paradise Path RPG Ep 4
attributes.caption: "I guess lets make me look less homely, right?"
attributes.description:
After battling scores of feral, mushroom encrusted creatures, the gang wakes up in a world that has no recollection of the previous night's mayhem. Will Sloan's prophetic vision of a Medford Bend engulfed in flames come true? Who is the charred mystery man haunting her dreams? And will her last minute makeover be enough to win the heart of Dex? 

 

Follow us on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/ElyseWillems

https://twitter.com/jameswillems

attributes.title: The Multiverse of Radness - Paradise Path RPG Ep 5
attributes.caption: "Is he a natural bad boy, or a situational bad boy?"
attributes.description:
Last week on Must Be Dice: While investigating clues revealed in Sloan's eerie prescient dream, the gang was led through a secret ARP tunnel to the Staunch Diner, where two injured members of the Hell's Pass Gang were hidden in the basement. What other mysteries does the diner hold? How does this all connect to the strange shift in reality? And how did Sloan suddenly get so flaming hot?

 

Follow us on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/ElyseWillems

attributes.title: Sins of the Fathers, Children Unleashed - Paradise Path RPG Ep 6
attributes.caption: "Smoking's good for babies."
attributes.description:
After days of monsters, killer fungus, and portals into dark dimensions, the kids of the the Paradise Path Mystery Solvers Club have finally snuck into the bowels of the ARP headquarters. But what abominable experiments will they uncover? What are their parents not telling them? And what does this all have to do with Sloan's burgeoning Psychic powers?

attributes.title: Escape the Darkness, Behold the Truth - Paradise Path RPG Ep 7
attributes.caption: "Does Eddie Money exist in this world?"
attributes.description:
The mysteries of the Artifact Recovery Project are finally coming to light as our favorite teenage mystery solvers make their way deeper into ARP's treacherous mountain fortress. But can our team flee the labs before they too are overtaken by the mutating fungal mist? Who are the strange yet familiar beings slowly approaching from within the portal? Who is behind this multiversal carnage? And what secrets from the past will be revealed next?



Follow us on Twitter!

attributes.title: What's REALLY Going On? - Paradise Path RPG Ep 8
attributes.caption: "What do her armpits look like?"
attributes.description:
Last time on Must Be Dice, the Paradise Path Mystery Solvers Club found themselves trapped in the ARP's Headquarters. During their daring escape they came face to face with a whole grip of new deadly foes. There's the mysterious entity growing in the portal they opened, the ARP prisoner who looks exactly like Sloane, and now five undead figures are rising from the bottom of the lake. How're they gonna make it out of this one? Can they ever catch a break? Who the heck is Casper Hogwood?

Follow us on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/ElyseWillems
https://twitter.com/jameswillems
https://twitter.com/_JacobFullerton

attributes.title: Some Other Beginning's End - Paradise Path RGP Ep 9
attributes.caption: "This is an adventure about backtracking."
attributes.description:
This is it! The final episode of Must Be Dice finds our mystery solving heroes in a heap of trouble. Ambushed by the goons of the ARP, and with nothing but Sloan's mysterious new powers to aid them, things look bleak for the team. Will they defeat the evil darkness lurking in the void? Will Sloan and Dex ever share that first kiss? And will our courageous improvisors ruin Armando's story to the point that he will never ever roleplay again? Only one way to find out!



Follow us on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/ElyseWillems

attributes.title: Worst Mythical Roommate Ever - Funhaus RPG Special!
attributes.caption: "Doggy style or otherwise!"
attributes.description:
